image1.alt: Girl wearing a head covering holding a hand drawn picture of her violent environment.

content.text1: This year through our annual Peacemakers Campaign we want to not only raise the money necessary to support life-changing peacebuilding projects around the world, but we want to encourage and inspire you to take action.

button1.description: Introduction to our Peacemakers campaign and watch video button.

content.text1: Thanks to your generosity we blew past our goal and raised $271,844 to support peace work that brings healing, reconciliation, and justice to God's creation!
We're excited to invest in a number of special projects over the next few years that are generating stories of impact. Find out how you can make a difference.

image1.alt: A man and a woman talking to a camera.

content.text1: What does justice look like and how can we take meaninful action to work towards peace in our communities and around the world?

image1.alt: Older woman smiling holding a baked pie.

content.text1: Making peace is for everyone, not just those of us who are blessed with money. Check out how you can make an impact with your kids and youth.
